item.title: OwlGuard: A multi-instance SIEM rule manager.
item.author: Hato0
item.description: Summary OwlGuard is a platform designed to provide security teams a better way to manage SIEM rules. This tool aims to onboard clients efficiently just by using already developed rules and a simple connection to their SIEM. For now, only SPLUNK is supported, if the project get interest, other SIEM will be included in the support list. Language used When I’m doing a project, I’m not only doing it to develop something that will be helpful for me or other but also to learn new things.
